${modID}:ExampleCard.NAME: Name
${modID}:ExampleCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This will automatically be used if the card is upgraded. Remove it if unneeded.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: You can put more text in here.
If you need to use it for stuff.
Blizzard is a good example for this.

${modID}:AetherDischarge_Warforged.NAME: Aether Discharge
${modID}:AetherDischarge_Warforged.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage X times to ALL enemies.
${modID}:AetherDischarge_Warforged.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage X + 1 times to ALL enemies.

${modID}:FluxNode_Warforged.NAME: Flux Node
${modID}:FluxNode_Warforged.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Replacement_Part NL Whenever you play a card that costs !M! [E] or more, gain !${modID}:DEX_GAIN! temporary Dexterity.

${modID}:Gyrospine_Warforged.NAME: Gyrospine
${modID}:Gyrospine_Warforged.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Replacement_Part NL The next time you fall to half health or less, gain !M! Regen.

${modID}:Neurolink_Warforged.NAME: Neurolink
${modID}:Neurolink_Warforged.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Replacement_Part NL Whenever you attack an enemy that intends to attack, gain !M! ${modID}:Energy_Shield.

${modID}:RaiseShields_Warforged.NAME: Raise Shields
${modID}:RaiseShields_Warforged.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! ${modID}:Energy_Shield !M! times. NL Dexterity affects this card.

${modID}:StabilizeShields_Warforged.NAME: Stabilize Shields
${modID}:StabilizeShields_Warforged.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! ${modID}:Energy_Shield. NL ${modID}:Energy_Shield is not lost at the start of your next turn.

${modID}:VeryParticularScrew_Warforged.NAME: Very Particular Screw
${modID}:VeryParticularScrew_Warforged.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Replacement_Part NL At the end of your turn, gain !M! Block.

${modID}:_BlockModifier.NAME: Cool Block Modifier
${modID}:_BlockModifier.DESCRIPTION: A cool block modifier that does things.

${modID}:EnergyShieldBlockModifier.NAME: Energy Shield
${modID}:EnergyShieldBlockModifier.DESCRIPTION: A powerful energy barrier that negates damage before #yBlock is applied.
